description:
Keep your feet warm on the coldest of days. The thick thermal yarn helps your feet stay toasty, thanks to the brushed long pile interior trapping warm air close to the skin.

  • Heavy thermal yarn for extra warmth
  • Moisture wicking to keep you dry all day
  • Soft brushed inside pile provides comfort and extra warmth
  • Non-binding, diabetic-friendly design provides relief for cold feet due to circulation problems
name: Heat Holders Snowdrop Block Twist Crew Socks - Women's
